front.title: Multicast Avalanche Avoidance in Mobile IP (MAAMIP)

abstract.t: While it is a necessary feature that the home agent tunnelsmulticast packets to mobile nodes away from home, it can causesevere network congestion on the forward path between the homeagent and the care-of address nodes, because of the unicasttunneling of multicast packets. Multicast avalanche avoidance inMobile IP (MAAMIP) is designed to avoid the network congestion byusing of Explicit multicast tunneling. Explicit multicast tunnelingin Mobile IP enables avoidance of network congestion and realizesthe true bandwidth saving, which is the primitive goal ofmulticast.
